title: The Messenger
occurrences: Our hero's name was Abraham. He was a Messenger, going from town to town.
...and learn about Messenger Abraham's story.
There is a character. The Messenger Abraham in this tale.
There was a Messenger Abraham.
No, David, what did we say? Keep the Messenger's face blank in your mind.
Do you know what a Messenger is? He is a man who delivers one's news...
Tell me the end of the tale... What happens to the Messenger?
She was taking care of the Messenger.
At that very moment, God gave the Messenger Abraham, the strength of a warrior.
Before the Messenger came, no one knew what had happened to them...
It was as if God had given the Messenger...
Night became day but, the Messenger was nowhere to be found.
...the other five, said the Messenger.
The Messenger actually knew everything.
The mightiest of all men, the Messenger let the man live...
The Messenger showed me the darkness of my heart.
No one saw the Messenger again.
They said that the Messenger Abraham had disappeared, had vanished.
All that was left was a crazy wind and that wind whispered the Messenger's name.
The Messenger will come... He will show you how dark your heart is.
The Messenger Abraham will come for you.
Mister... Send word to the Messenger. Have him come straight away.
Send word to the Messenger; tell him "Ferhat is waiting for you!".
It is all right... You just send word to the Messenger. Have him come.
You had them memorize the Messenger's tale...
I told you not to imagine anyone you know as the Messenger.
Tell me what Messenger Abraham looks like. David, you start.
The Messenger friend to the meek, enemy to the cruel.
He created the Messenger and named him Abraham.
Every time he told the tale, the Messenger Abraham would get his revenge...
He had Mehmed live in the Messenger. He gave him a make believe life.
Then, he believed his own tale and went after the Messenger.
They speak the truth... I saw the Messenger too.
The tale is not a lie. The Messenger will come.
He came. The Messenger has come, Sister.
The Messenger is here.
Mister... He came, right? The Messenger came? Didn't he?
It was the Messenger.
And the Messenger was even larger, and more courageous then they had said.
The blowing wind, was the Messenger's breath...
And that wind whispered the Messenger's name...
